headline: S&P 500 Stock Axon Surges; How Taser Maker Disarmed AI Software Doubts
summary: S&P 500 stock Axon Enterprise blew away fourth-quarter estimates after Tuesday's close and set a target for more than doubling sales over the next three years.  Axon stock, which lost half its value amid worry over AI software disruption, led all S&P 500 stocks on Wednesday and was on track for another top 10 performance on Thursday.  The maker of Tasers, body cameras, drones and software for law enforcement signaled confidence that it can keep deepening its relationship with law enforcement customers while seizing on its opportunity with enterprises.

headline: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Dip As Rate Sensitivity Tempers Optimism
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Thursday, Feb, 26 2026 US stock futures are slightly softer this morning, with E-mini S&P 500 contracts edging lower by about 0.1% while volatility gauges like VIX futures sit just under 20, signaling a cautious tone rather than outright fear. Overseas, Taiwan reported a record current account surplus of US$69.93b and record M2 money supply growth of 5.16% YoY, pointing to strong cash generation that can feed global tech and semiconductor supply...

headline: Assessing Axon Enterprise (AXON) Valuation After Recent Share Price Rebound
summary: Why Axon Enterprise Is On Investors’ Radar Axon Enterprise (AXON) has attracted attention after a period where the share price showed mixed returns, with 1 day and 7 day gains alongside declines over the past month and past 3 months.
